notes.text:
This update for jetty-minimal fixes the following issues:

- Update to version 9.4.43.v20210629
- CVE-2021-34429: URIs can be crafted using some encoded characters to access the content of the WEB-INF directory and/or bypass some security constraints. (bsc#1188438)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: For Eclipse Jetty versions 9.4.37-9.4.42, 10.0.1-10.0.5 & 11.0.1-11.0.5, URIs can be crafted using some encoded characters to access the content of the WEB-INF directory and/or bypass some security constraints. This is a variation of the vulnerability reported in CVE-2021-28164/GHSA-v7ff-8wcx-gmc5.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
